attributes.action: Look at GPS tracking for children to act as a deterent in abductions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If finance could be found to develope and supply a GPS tagging system to parents. children would have the right to have the devise removed after the age of parental consent. this devise can be inserted under the skin at an early age. If we can have them for Cars why not for the most precious members of our society.
